string.value: You should read through #t4161050#, which you received from Winston. It may help you understand #p1013000# a little bit better. Once you're finished reading it, be sure to return it to #b#p1032001##k in #m101000000# #m101000003#.\r\n\r\n#y22547# #b(#u22547#)#k
#p1032001# says that he will let you know if a new book regarding Dragons comes in or if new information arrives from #p2081000#, his friend in #m240000000#.
Thank you for getting rid of those #o3210100#s. I don't need this #t4161050# anymore so #byou take the book and read it, and then return it to the #m101000003# in #m101000000##k when you're done.
I hope there isn't a late fee or anything like that... No way, I guarded this book with my life! They couldn't possibly ask for more.
Hm? Didn't you defeat the #o3210100#s because you needed the book? If you don't want it, I'll hold on to it a little longer and read a bit more. Let me know if you change your mind.
Huh? Haven't you found #t4161050# yet? From what I heard from Dr. #p1032104#, you've already gone to see #b#p1022006##k in #b#m101030401##k to get the book...
Have you not returned the book yet? Please return it to #m101000003##k in #b#m101000000# as soon as possible. It's already late.
Hm? Haven't you found #t4161050# yet? From what I hear from Dr. #p1032104#, you've already gone to see #b#p1022006##k in #b#m101030401##k to get the book...

How could you lose the book? What would have happened if I hadn't picked it up? It could have been burnt by a #o3210100#. Please be careful and return it to the #m101000000# #m101000003# in one piece.
